Repeat: knit in front and back of stitch twice; p2, k1, p2
k2, p1, k2, knit 4 stitches putting the thread twice around needle each time
Knit 4 letting the extra loops drop; p2, k1, p2
k2, p1, k2, knit 4 stitches putting the thread twice around needle each time
Knit 4 letting the extra loops drop; p2, k1, p2
k1, p2; knit in front and back of stitch twice; p2
k2; knit 4 stitches putting the thread twice around needle each time; k2, p1
k1, p2; knit 4 letting the extra loops drop; p2
k2; knit 4 stitches putting the thread twice around needle each time; k2, p1
k1, p2; knit 4 letting the extra loops drop; p2
